text: Nocardioides alkalitolerans is a gram-positive bacterium from the genus Nocardioides that has been isolated from soil in South Korea.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardioides alkalitolerans at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase alkalitolerans Category:Bacteria described in 2005
title: Nocardioides alkalitolerans
